ibis.ipl

Class IbisFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ibis.ipl.IbisFactory

  • public final class IbisFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class responsible for starting an Ibis instance. During initialization, this class determines which Ibis implementations are available. It does so by finding all jar files in either the class path or all jar files in the directories indicated by the ibis.ipl.impl.path property. All Ibis implementations should be mentioned in the main properties of the manifest of the jar file containing it, in the "Ibis-Starter" entry. This entry should contain a comma- or space-separated list of class names, where each class named provides an IbisStarter implementation. In addition, a property "Ibis-IPL-Version" should be defined in the manifest, containing a version number (e.g. 2.1).

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_IMPLEMENTATION

        public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_IMPLEMENTATION
        Nickname of the default Ibis implementation. This is the Ibis implementation used, unless the user explicitly requests another implementation.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getManifestProperty

        public static java.lang.String getManifestProperty(java.lang.String p)
        This method is for internal use only. It obtains a property from the IPL manifest file that is present in the IPL jar. If the property is not present in the manifest file, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        p - the property name.
        Returns:
        the value of the specified property.

      • createIbis

        public static Ibis createIbis(IbisCapabilities requiredCapabilities,
                              RegistryEventHandler registryEventHandler,
                              PortType... portTypes)
                       throws IbisCreationFailedException
        Creates a new Ibis instance, making sure that the Ibis implementation chosen implements the specified capabilities and port types.
        Parameters:
        requiredCapabilities - ibis capabilities required by the application.
        registryEventHandler - a RegistryEventHandler instance, or null.
        portTypes - the list of port types required by the application.
        Returns:
        the new Ibis instance.
        Throws:
        IbisCreationFailedException - is thrown when the chosen Ibis implementation cannot be created for some reason.

      • createIbis

        public static Ibis createIbis(IbisCapabilities requiredCapabilities,
                              java.util.Properties properties,
                              boolean addDefaultConfigProperties,
                              RegistryEventHandler registryEventHandler,
                              PortType... portTypes)
                       throws IbisCreationFailedException
        Creates a new Ibis instance, based on the specified properties, making sure that the Ibis implementation chosen implements the specified capabilities and port types.
        Parameters:
        requiredCapabilities - ibis capabilities required by the application.
        properties - properties that can be set, for instance a class path for searching ibis implementations, or which registry to use. There is a default, so null may be specified.
        addDefaultConfigProperties - when set, the default properties are added, loaded from the system properties, a "ibis.properties" file, etc, for as far as these are not set in the properties parameter.
        registryEventHandler - a RegistryEventHandler instance, or null.
        portTypes - the list of port types required by the application. Can be an empty list, but not null.
        Returns:
        the new Ibis instance.
        Throws:
        IbisCreationFailedException - is thrown when no Ibis was found that matches the capabilities required, or a matching Ibis could not be instantiated for some reason.

      • createIbis

        public static Ibis createIbis(IbisCapabilities requiredCapabilities,
                              java.util.Properties properties,
                              boolean addDefaultConfigProperties,
                              RegistryEventHandler registryEventHandler,
                              Credentials credentials,
                              PortType... portTypes)
                       throws IbisCreationFailedException
        Creates a new Ibis instance, based on the specified properties, making sure that the Ibis implementation chosen implements the specified capabilities and port types.
        Parameters:
        requiredCapabilities - ibis capabilities required by the application.
        properties - properties that can be set, for instance a class path for searching ibis implementations, or which registry to use. There is a default, so null may be specified.
        addDefaultConfigProperties - when set, the default properties are added, loaded from the system properties, a "ibis.properties" file, etc, for as far as these are not set in the properties parameter.
        registryEventHandler - a RegistryEventHandler instance, or null.
        credentials - Credentials used to join the pool. This could be a password, a certificate, or something else.
        portTypes - the list of port types required by the application. Can be an empty list, but not null.
        Returns:
        the new Ibis instance.
        Throws:
        IbisCreationFailedException - is thrown when the chosen Ibis implementation cannot be created for some reason.

      • createIbis

        public static Ibis createIbis(IbisCapabilities requiredCapabilities,
                              java.util.Properties properties,
                              boolean addDefaultConfigProperties,
                              RegistryEventHandler registryEventHandler,
                              Credentials credentials,
                              java.lang.String tag,
                              PortType... portTypes)
                       throws IbisCreationFailedException
        Creates a new Ibis instance, based on the specified properties, making sure that the Ibis implementation chosen implements the specified capabilities and port types.
        Parameters:
        requiredCapabilities - ibis capabilities required by the application.
        properties - properties that can be set, for instance a class path for searching ibis implementations, or which registry to use. There is a default, so null may be specified.
        addDefaultConfigProperties - when set, the default properties are added, loaded from the system properties, a "ibis.properties" file, etc, for as far as these are not set in the properties parameter.
        registryEventHandler - a RegistryEventHandler instance, or null.
        credentials - Credentials used to join the pool. This could be a password, a certificate, or something else.
        tag - A tag for this Ibis instance.
        portTypes - the list of port types required by the application. Can be an empty list, but not null.
        Returns:
        the new Ibis instance.
        Throws:
        IbisCreationFailedException - is thrown when the chosen Ibis implementation cannot be created for some reason.

      • createIbis

        public static Ibis createIbis(IbisCapabilities requiredCapabilities,
                              java.util.Properties properties,
                              boolean addDefaultConfigProperties,
                              RegistryEventHandler registryEventHandler,
                              Credentials credentials,
                              byte[] tag,
                              PortType... portTypes)
                       throws IbisCreationFailedException
        Creates a new Ibis instance, based on the specified properties, making sure that the Ibis implementation chosen implements the specified capabilities and port types.
        Parameters:
        requiredCapabilities - ibis capabilities required by the application.
        properties - properties that can be set, for instance a class path for searching ibis implementations, or which registry to use. There is a default, so null may be specified.
        addDefaultConfigProperties - when set, the default properties are added, loaded from the system properties, a "ibis.properties" file, etc, for as far as these are not set in the properties parameter.
        registryEventHandler - a RegistryEventHandler instance, or null.
        credentials - Credentials used to join the pool. This could be a password, a certificate, or something else.
        tag - A tag for this Ibis instance.
        portTypes - the list of port types required by the application. Can be an empty list, but not null.
        Returns:
        the new Ibis instance.
        Throws:
        IbisCreationFailedException - is thrown when the chosen Ibis implementation cannot be created for some reason.

      • createIbis

        public Ibis createIbis(RegistryEventHandler registryEventHandler,
                       IbisCapabilities requiredCapabilities,
                       java.util.Properties properties,
                       Credentials credentials,
                       byte[] applicationTag,
                       PortType[] portTypes,
                       java.lang.String specifiedImplementation)
                throws IbisCreationFailedException
        For internal use only. Creates an ibis. Should only be used by Ibises to create "child" Ibises. Applications should use the static functions to create an Ibis instance.
        Parameters:
        registryEventHandler - a RegistryEventHandler instance, or null.
        requiredCapabilities - ibis capabilities required by the application.
        properties - properties that can be set, for instance a class path for searching ibis implementations, or which registry to use. There is a default, so null may be specified.
        credentials - Credentials used to join the pool. This could be a password, a certificate, or something else.
        applicationTag - A tag for this Ibis instance.
        portTypes - the list of port types required by the application. Can be an empty list, but not null.
        specifiedImplementation - comma-separated implementation stack.
        Returns:
        the new Ibis instance.
        Throws:
        IbisCreationFailedException - is thrown when the chosen Ibis implementation cannot be created for some reason.
